name: Anitha Uwimpuhwe
title: Aspiring Software Engineer and a cybersecurity enthusiast
about: I’m a Software Engineering student at African Leadership University (Year 2) with a strong passion for cybersecurity, holding an (ISC)² Cybersecurity Certification. I love building secure, efficient software and enjoy problem-solving in coding and security. My goal is to merge development with cybersecurity best practices to create resilient systems.
